verses.verse: These are the <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H3772>make<s%> with the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, beside the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with them in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> unto all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H7200>them<s%>, You have seen all that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> unto <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and unto all his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and unto all his <S%H776>land<s%>;
The <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4531>temptations<s%> which your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> have <S%H7200>seen<s%>, the <S%H226>signs<s%>, and those <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4159>miracles<s%>:

Yet the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has not <S%H5414>given<s%> you an <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H3045>perceive<s%>, and <S%H5869>eyes<s%> to <S%H7200>see<s%>, and <S%H241>ears<s%> to <S%H8085>hear<s%>, unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And I have <S%H3212>led<s%> you <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: your <S%H8008>clothes<s%> are not grown <S%H1086>old<s%> upon <S%H5275>you<s%>, and your shoe is not grown <S%H1086>old<s%> upon your <S%H7272>foot<s%>.

You have not <S%H398>eaten<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, neither have you <S%H8354>drunk<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> or strong <S%H7941>drink<s%>: that you might <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>.

And when you <S%H935>came<s%> unto this <S%H4725>place<s%>, <S%H5511>Sihon<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and <S%H5747>Og<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1316>Bashan<s%>, came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H7125>against<s%> us unto <S%H4421>battle<s%>, and we struck <S%H5221>them<s%>:

And we <S%H3947>took<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> it for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> unto the <S%H7206>Reubenites<s%>, and to the <S%H1425>Gadites<s%>, and to the <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H4520>Manasseh<s%>.
<S%H8104>Keep<s%> therefore the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H1285>covenant<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H7919>them<s%>, that you may prosper in all that you <S%H6213>do<s%>.

You <S%H5324>stand<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> all of you <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>; your <S%H7218>captains<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes<s%>, your <S%H2205>elders<s%>, and your <S%H7860>officers<s%>, with all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>,

Your little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, your <S%H802>wives<s%>, and your <S%H1616>stranger<s%> that is <S%H7130>in<s%> your <S%H4264>camp<s%>, from the <S%H2404>hewer<s%> of your <S%H6086>wood<s%> unto the <S%H7579>drawer<s%> of your <S%H4325>water<s%>:

That you should <S%H5674>enter<s%> into <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and into his <S%H423>oath<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3772>makes<s%> with you this <S%H3117>day<s%>:

That he may <S%H6965>establish<s%> you to <S%H3117>day<s%> for a <S%H5971>people<s%> unto <S%H430>himself<s%>, and that he may be unto you a God, as he has <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H7650>you<s%>, and as he has sworn unto your <S%H1>fathers<s%>, to <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.
Neither with you only do I <S%H3772>make<s%> this <S%H1285>covenant<s%> and this <S%H423>oath<s%>;

But with him that <S%H5975>standeth<s%> here with us <S%H3426>this<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, and also with him that is not here with us this <S%H3117>day<s%>:

(For you <S%H3045>know<s%> how we have <S%H3427>lived<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>; and how we <S%H5674>came<s%> <S%H7130>through<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which you passed <S%H5674>by<s%>;

And you have <S%H7200>seen<s%> their <S%H8251>abominations<s%>, and their <S%H1544>idols<s%>, <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone<s%>, <S%H3701>silver<s%> and <S%H2091>gold<s%>, which were among them:)

Lest there should <S%H3426>be<s%> among you <S%H376>man<s%>, or <S%H802>woman<s%>, or <S%H4940>family<s%>, or <S%H7626>tribe<s%>, whose <S%H3824>heart<s%> turneth <S%H6437>away<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H3212>go<s%> and <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%> of these <S%H1471>nations<s%>; lest there should <S%H3426>be<s%> among you a <S%H8328>root<s%> that <S%H6509>bears<s%> <S%H7219>gall<s%> and <S%H3939>wormwood<s%>;

And it come to <S%H8085>pass<s%>, when he hears the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H423>curse<s%>, that he <S%H1288>bless<s%> himself in his <S%H3824>heart<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I shall have <S%H7965>peace<s%>, <S%H3588>though<s%> I <S%H3212>walk<s%> in the <S%H8307>imagination<s%> of my <S%H3820>heart<s%>, to <S%H5595>add<s%> <S%H7302>drunkenness<s%> to <S%H6771>thirst<s%>:

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H14>will<s%> not <S%H5545>spare<s%> <S%H639>him<s%>, but then the anger of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and his <S%H7068>jealousy<s%> shall <S%H6225>smoke<s%> against that <S%H376>man<s%>, and all the <S%H423>curses<s%> that are <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book<s%> shall <S%H7257>lie<s%> upon <S%H3068>him<s%>, and the Lord shall blot <S%H4229>out<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> from under <S%H8064>heaven<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> shall <S%H914>separate<s%> him unto <S%H7451>evil<s%> out of all the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, according to all the <S%H423>curses<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> that are <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H8451>law<s%>:

So that the <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H314>come<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons<s%> that shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H5237>you<s%>, and the stranger that shall <S%H935>come<s%> from a <S%H7350>far<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, shall <S%H559>say<s%>, when they <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4347>plagues<s%> of that <S%H776>land<s%>, and the <S%H8463>sicknesses<s%> which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has laid upon <S%H2470>it<s%>;

And that the whole <S%H776>land<s%> there is <S%H1614>brimstone<s%>, and <S%H4417>salt<s%>, and <S%H8316>burning<s%>, that it is not <S%H2232>sown<s%>, nor <S%H6779>bears<s%>, nor any <S%H6212>grass<s%> <S%H5927>grows<s%> in <S%H4114>it<s%>, like the overthrow of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>, <S%H126>Admah<s%>, and <S%H6636>Zeboim<s%>, which the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2015>overthrew<s%> in his <S%H639>anger<s%>, and in his <S%H2534>wrath<s%>:

Even all <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%>, Why has the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6213>done<s%> thus unto this <S%H776>land<s%>? what means the <S%H2750>heat<s%> of this <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%>?

Then men shall <S%H559>say<s%>, Because they have <S%H5800>forsaken<s%> the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, which he <S%H3772>made<s%> with them when he brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>:

For they <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H5647>served<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%>, and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> <S%H430>them<s%>, gods whom they <S%H3045>knew<s%> <S%H2505>not<s%>, and whom he had not given unto them:

And the <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was <S%H2734>kindled<s%> against this <S%H776>land<s%>, to <S%H935>bring<s%> upon it all the <S%H7045>curses<s%> that are <S%H3789>written<s%> in this <S%H5612>book<s%>:

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5428>rooted<s%> them out of their <S%H127>land<s%> in <S%H639>anger<s%>, and in <S%H2534>wrath<s%>, and in <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7110>indignation<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them into <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H776>land<s%>, as it is this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

The <S%H5641>secret<s%> things belong unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>: but those things which are <S%H1540>revealed<s%> belong unto us and to our <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, that we may <S%H6213>do<s%> all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of this <S%H8451>law<s%>.
